title: How can I get saved?

body_html:
Pray

And sin no more

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body:
> I recommend orthodoxy as it is the most plain, true to the book that you'll find. According to them (I am not a pastor or anything like that, for an honest appraisal please speak to one).

Orthodoxy is replacing God with a church and people. The Jewish priesthood didn't go over so well, nor did Christian churches for thousands of years.

> They would tell you that sin is forgiven if you were ignorant.

You can't be considered guilty in the first place if you were ignorant. Everything but deciding you're the enemy of the holy spirit is covered, and even that I believe is only if you don't later repent of it.

> you can't really stray.

Big lie. People are plenty self-righteous and full of themselves as it is.
body_html:
I recommend orthodoxy as it is the most plain, true to the book that you'll find. According to them (I am not a pastor or anything like that, for an honest appraisal please speak to one).

Orthodoxy is replacing God with a church and people. The Jewish priesthood didn't go over so well, nor did Christian churches for thousands of years.

They would tell you that sin is forgiven if you were ignorant.

You can't be considered guilty in the first place if you were ignorant. Everything but deciding you're the enemy of the holy spirit is covered, and even that I believe is only if you don't later repent of it.

you can't really stray.

Big lie. People are plenty self-righteous and full of themselves as it is.

body:
That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus (that Jesus is Lord and Savior), and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised Him from the dead, thou shalt be saved.
10 For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness, and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation. 

This means salvation.
Romans 9:9,10
body_html:
That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus (that Jesus is Lord and Savior), and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised Him from the dead, thou shalt be saved. 10 For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness, and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation.

This means salvation. Romans 9:9,10

body: Praying can't do anything, nor can merely "not sinning" which is actually just self-righteousness. It's a genuine change of heart.
body_html: Praying can't do anything, nor can merely "not sinning" which is actually just self-righteousness. It's a genuine change of heart.

body:
[Do you know about](https://biblehub.com/interlinear/luke/3.htm) [the real Jesus?](https://biblehub.com/interlinear/mark/3.htm) Do you want to be considered one of his followers, disciples, children? Are you ashamed of your own ills? Do you hate this world? Do you want to?

It's a change of heart, and a willingness to enter.
body_html:
Do you know about the real Jesus? Do you want to be considered one of his followers, disciples, children? Are you ashamed of your own ills? Do you hate this world? Do you want to?

It's a change of heart, and a willingness to enter.

body:
Lemme guess 

We’re gonna have another little argument spanning over 4 hours of back and forth? 

Because your an insufferable lolbert who worships the free market as if it were its self a god?

Go back to questioning weather or not pegging is moral.

“Christianity is jewish!”

You obviously never heard the other side of the story other than antithesist threads on 4chan 

Maybe you should begin to question your ideologies jewish beginnings 

Murray rothbard

Ludwig von Mises 

Walter block

Lemme guess

We’re gonna have another little argument spanning over 4 hours of back and forth?

Because your an insufferable lolbert who worships the free market as if it were its self a god?

body:
> In the orthodox you wouldn't really visit a church very often you're praying and serving in private.

The problem is it sets up a hierarchical church structure where people holding offices replace God. And most people blindly believe everything they tell them. Even evangelical protestants are too orthodox, let alone actual orthodox and catholics

> You very much can be considered guilty regardless of ignorance.

"If I didn't come and speak to them, *they would not have error*, but now they have no excuse for their error" - John 15:22
body_html:
In the orthodox you wouldn't really visit a church very often you're praying and serving in private.

The problem is it sets up a hierarchical church structure where people holding offices replace God. And most people blindly believe everything they tell them. Even evangelical protestants are too orthodox, let alone actual orthodox and catholics

You very much can be considered guilty regardless of ignorance.

"If I didn't come and speak to them, they would not have error, but now they have no excuse for their error" - John 15:22

body:
> Because your an insufferable lolbert who worships the free market as if it were its self a god?

It's very flawed but the problem is that everything else is even worse. And if we have a 4 hour argument it's every bit as much yours.

> Go back to questioning weather or not pegging is moral.

What the hell does that have to do with this?

> Maybe you should begin to question your ideologies jewish beginnings

It makes sense that it's similar to some Jewish ideals, considering the Hebrew Bible is very important to both.
body_html:
Because your an insufferable lolbert who worships the free market as if it were its self a god?

It's very flawed but the problem is that everything else is even worse. And if we have a 4 hour argument it's every bit as much yours.

Go back to questioning weather or not pegging is moral.

What the hell does that have to do with this?

Maybe you should begin to question your ideologies jewish beginnings

It makes sense that it's similar to some Jewish ideals, considering the Hebrew Bible is very important to both.

body: Be baptized into the True Church established by Jesus Christ - the Eastern Orthodox Church. Then follow the commandments of Christ set forth in Holy Scripture as well as the examples of the Saints who have achieved salvation. Submit yourself to the authority of your parish priest. Pray that Jesus has mercy on your wretched soul :)
body_html: Be baptized into the True Church established by Jesus Christ - the Eastern Orthodox Church. Then follow the commandments of Christ set forth in Holy Scripture as well as the examples of the Saints who have achieved salvation. Submit yourself to the authority of your parish priest. Pray that Jesus has mercy on your wretched soul :)

body:
Salvation by faith alone is the pathway some follow. 

Asking forgiveness is part of my bread and butter and striving to be the best you can be. 

Confessions by mouth count. 

A baptism isnt hard to get, especially if you live near any baptist churches, who will usually arrange a baptism by request. 

Accepting Jesus as the way and turning yourself to him in faith (pretty close to salvation by faith alone, just with a little more Jesus)  

Take the shotgun approach and try em all. 

If you want reply to this message and ill get you saved over the phone with my preacher until you can find a church you like. (This is not a sales pitch. That feels like I shouldn't have to say that but its the internet, so I guess I felt the need to say that. No money or some such. Just a phone call/s)
body_html:
Salvation by faith alone is the pathway some follow.

Asking forgiveness is part of my bread and butter and striving to be the best you can be.

Confessions by mouth count.

A baptism isnt hard to get, especially if you live near any baptist churches, who will usually arrange a baptism by request.

Accepting Jesus as the way and turning yourself to him in faith (pretty close to salvation by faith alone, just with a little more Jesus)

Take the shotgun approach and try em all.

If you want reply to this message and ill get you saved over the phone with my preacher until you can find a church you like. (This is not a sales pitch. That feels like I shouldn't have to say that but its the internet, so I guess I felt the need to say that. No money or some such. Just a phone call/s)

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

parent.body: Be baptized into the True Church established by Jesus Christ - the Eastern Orthodox Church. Then follow the commandments of Christ set forth in Holy Scripture as well as the examples of the Saints who have achieved salvation. Submit yourself to the authority of your parish priest. Pray that Jesus has mercy on your wretched soul :)
parent.body_html: Be baptized into the True Church established by Jesus Christ - the Eastern Orthodox Church. Then follow the commandments of Christ set forth in Holy Scripture as well as the examples of the Saints who have achieved salvation. Submit yourself to the authority of your parish priest. Pray that Jesus has mercy on your wretched soul :)

author.bio:
Da pacem, Domine, in diebus nostris

Quia non est alius

Qui pugnet pro nobis

Nisi tu Deus noster.
author.bio_html:
Da pacem, Domine, in diebus nostris

Quia non est alius

Qui pugnet pro nobis

Nisi tu Deus noster.

body:
Immerse yourself in the teachings of Jesus and follow the ten commandments. If you get confused as our own wisdom is often faulty and liable to lead us astray, ask Him to show you the way and He will guide your feet. Then acknowledge and repent for your many sins, that means accepting the Lord's correction and getting rebuked occasionally as the Lord rebukes & corrects those whom He loves. Speak to Jesus and ask Him for guidance. His teachings are comprehensive, but the grey areas are the devil's playground, so never stop trying to do better and accept His corrections & teachings.

Some people say baptism, some people say simply acknowledging that Jesus is King, but you must first repent and learn. Do not be like the hypocrites and suddenly think you are perfect the way you are upon accepting Jesus into your heart. He does love you for who you are, but the world's stink is upon you and it will poison you against the Lord at one point or another. By wishing for the Lord's salvation that means you've entered into a race and a war that's been ran since time immemorial for the souls of this world. You cannot just clap your hands and say I follow Jesus then continue on sinning freely without a care in the world. You'd be better off never having heard His teachings than you would be hearing them and going off on your own as if that's worked out for you. Beware the snares set before your feet for your enemy is many and they do not sleep. They do not grow weary. And they are not your friend, no matter how pretty they and their words are. They want to drag you into the abyss and torture your immortal soul, but separation from God is the ultimate goal.

Remember, the path to salvation is narrow and the path to hell is broad. It's a struggle. It's a struggle every day but trust not your own understanding and lean on Him, even when it's hard. God is not a man who changes their mind so easily, He will never abandon you and He will give you strength even when you are weak, even when the world sets itself upon you. Good luck and I'll be praying for your victory.
body_html:
Immerse yourself in the teachings of Jesus and follow the ten commandments. If you get confused as our own wisdom is often faulty and liable to lead us astray, ask Him to show you the way and He will guide your feet. Then acknowledge and repent for your many sins, that means accepting the Lord's correction and getting rebuked occasionally as the Lord rebukes & corrects those whom He loves. Speak to Jesus and ask Him for guidance. His teachings are comprehensive, but the grey areas are the devil's playground, so never stop trying to do better and accept His corrections & teachings.

Some people say baptism, some people say simply acknowledging that Jesus is King, but you must first repent and learn. Do not be like the hypocrites and suddenly think you are perfect the way you are upon accepting Jesus into your heart. He does love you for who you are, but the world's stink is upon you and it will poison you against the Lord at one point or another. By wishing for the Lord's salvation that means you've entered into a race and a war that's been ran since time immemorial for the souls of this world. You cannot just clap your hands and say I follow Jesus then continue on sinning freely without a care in the world. You'd be better off never having heard His teachings than you would be hearing them and going off on your own as if that's worked out for you. Beware the snares set before your feet for your enemy is many and they do not sleep. They do not grow weary. And they are not your friend, no matter how pretty they and their words are. They want to drag you into the abyss and torture your immortal soul, but separation from God is the ultimate goal.

Remember, the path to salvation is narrow and the path to hell is broad. It's a struggle. It's a struggle every day but trust not your own understanding and lean on Him, even when it's hard. God is not a man who changes their mind so easily, He will never abandon you and He will give you strength even when you are weak, even when the world sets itself upon you. Good luck and I'll be praying for your victory.

body: I suggest reading the book of Romans, which was a letter written to the church in Rome by Paul. Chapter 10 has specifics about what is required of salvation, but I suggest reading the letter in completion, even if you need to do so in chunks. You'll benefit a lot from reading the scripture as a whole and within its own context. (This is why I'm not throwing a verse quotation at you here.)
body_html: I suggest reading the book of Romans, which was a letter written to the church in Rome by Paul. Chapter 10 has specifics about what is required of salvation, but I suggest reading the letter in completion, even if you need to do so in chunks. You'll benefit a lot from reading the scripture as a whole and within its own context. (This is why I'm not throwing a verse quotation at you here.)

author.bio:
Faith, Hope, and Love is the path to Life, Liberty, and Happiness.

There is no justification for any human authority.
author.bio_html:
Faith, Hope, and Love is the path to Life, Liberty, and Happiness.

There is no justification for any human authority.

body:
The Kingdom of God is within you, you must soften your heart.  Do you want to be saved?

You must renounce your former allegiances, be obedient to Jesus' teachings, love your enemies, never repay evil with evil and forgive, care for the poor, outcast, and marginalized.
body_html:
The Kingdom of God is within you, you must soften your heart. Do you want to be saved?

You must renounce your former allegiances, be obedient to Jesus' teachings, love your enemies, never repay evil with evil and forgive, care for the poor, outcast, and marginalized.

body: Depends who you ask, but a good start would be to find a Church and get baptized in the name of the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit. I'm a Methodist, but uh... the Methodist Church is about to split in half lol, so you know, follow your conscience. It's there for a reason.
